languages.text: "Огонь, значит. Вера и великая святость в далекой дали, где горит золотая звезда, питаемая криками. Мы поняли. Мы подумаем об этом".
"A flame, then. Faith and great sanctity are far in the distance, where a golden star burns and feeds on cries. We understand now. We will think about this."
languages.original_text: "Огонь, значит. Вера и великая святость в далекой дали, где горит золотая звезда, питаемая криками. Мы поняли. Мы подумаем об этом".

traits.locale_text: "A flame, then. Faith and great sanctity are far in the distance, where a golden star burns and feeds on cries. We understand now. We will think about this."
"A flame, then. Faith and great sanctity far in the distance, where a golden star burns and feeds on cries. We understand now. We will think on this."
"A flame, then. Faith and great sanctity are far in the distance, where a golden star burns and feeds on cries. We understand now. We will think about this."
"A flame, then. Faith and great sanctity are far in the distance, where a golden star burns and feeds on cries. We understand now. We will think about this."
"A flame, then. Faith and great sanctity are far in the distance, where a golden star burns and feeds on cries. We understand now. We will think about this."
"A flame, then. Faith and great sanctity are far in the distance, where a golden star burns and feeds on cries. We understand now. We will think about this."

languages.text: « Une flamme, donc... Foi et sainteté restent au loin, là où brûle une étoile d'or qui se repaît de pleurs. Nous comprenons, désormais. Nous allons y réfléchir. »
languages.original_text: "A flame, then. Faith and great sanctity are far in the distance, where a golden star burns and feeds on cries. We understand now. We will think about this."

traits.locale_text: « Une flamme, donc... Foi et sainteté restent au loin, là où brûle une étoile d'or qui se repaît de pleurs. Nous comprenons, désormais. Nous allons y réfléchir. »

languages.text: “没错，是火焰。在远方的信仰与圣洁，那里有一颗金色的恒星在燃烧，以哭声为食。我们现在理解了。我们会思考的。”
languages.original_text: "A flame, then. Faith and great sanctity are far in the distance, where a golden star burns and feeds on cries. We understand now. We will think about this."

traits.locale_text: “没错，是火焰。在远方的信仰与圣洁，那里有一颗金色的恒星在燃烧，以哭声为食。我们现在理解了。我们会思考的。”

languages.text: "Eine Flamme also. Glaube und große Heiligkeit liegen in ferner Distanz, wo ein goldener Stern brennt und sich an Schreien labt. Wir verstehen jetzt. Wir werden darüber nachdenken."
languages.original_text: "A flame, then. Faith and great sanctity are far in the distance, where a golden star burns and feeds on cries. We understand now. We will think about this."

traits.locale_text: "Eine Flamme also. Glaube und große Heiligkeit liegen in ferner Distanz, wo ein goldener Stern brennt und sich an Schreien labt. Wir verstehen jetzt. Wir werden darüber nachdenken."

languages.text: «La llama, entonces. La fe y la gran santidad se encuentran lejos, donde una estrella dorada arde y se alimenta de gritos. Ahora lo entendemos. Esto nos dará que pensar».
languages.original_text: "A flame, then. Faith and great sanctity are far in the distance, where a golden star burns and feeds on cries. We understand now. We will think about this."

traits.locale_text: «La llama, entonces. La fe y la gran santidad se encuentran lejos, donde una estrella dorada arde y se alimenta de gritos. Ahora lo entendemos. Esto nos dará que pensar».

languages.text: 「では、炎のようなものだろう。信仰と偉大なる聖性は、金色の星が燃えて叫びを糧とする遥か彼方にある。やっと理解できた。しばらくこのことについて熟考させてもらう」
languages.original_text: "A flame, then. Faith and great sanctity are far in the distance, where a golden star burns and feeds on cries. We understand now. We will think about this."

traits.locale_text: 「では、炎のようなものだろう。信仰と偉大なる聖性は、金色の星が燃えて叫びを糧とする遥か彼方にある。やっと理解できた。しばらくこのことについて熟考させてもらう」

languages.text: "Demek bir alev. İnanç ve mukaddeslik çok uzakta, altın bir yıldızın yaktığı ve çığlıklarla beslendiği yerde. Şimdi anlıyoruz. Bunu düşüneceğiz."
languages.original_text: "A flame, then. Faith and great sanctity are far in the distance, where a golden star burns and feeds on cries. We understand now. We will think about this."

traits.locale_text: "Demek bir alev. İnanç ve mukaddeslik çok uzakta, altın bir yıldızın yaktığı ve çığlıklarla beslendiği yerde. Şimdi anlıyoruz. Bunu düşüneceğiz."
